channel.title: Shell on klosterbruders tech rants

item.title: Text processing for fun (and profit?)
item.description: Fasten your seatbelts, it’s going to get awkward. awk, together with grep, sed and fellows like tr, wc or cut are standard tools for commandline text processing on Linux, BSD and other Unix-based operating systems. They’re also bread-and-butter tools for sysadmins. Can’t remember which config file a certain setting was in? grep for it. Someone wants to know how many requests the webserver served yesterday? wc to the rescue! And so on.
